Courses.Name: SCHOLARS 1100F - 1ST YEAR SCHOLARS SEMINAR CRS
Description: This course will examine a theme of academic and/or public importance that is determined each year.

Notes: REQUISITES: Prerequisite(s):  Restricted to first-year Scholar's Electives Students
REQUISITES: Prerequisite(s):  Restricted to first-year Scholar's Electives Students

Courses.Name: SCHOLARS 2200E - SUPERVISED INDIVDL RESEARCH 1
Description: Students will work on a research project with a mentor whose principal appointment is normally within their faculty of registration. Mentors must be approved by the student’s faculty Associate Dean.

Notes: RESTRICTED TO SCHOLAR'S ELECTIVES STUDENTS. PERMISSION REQUIRED FROM HOME FACULTY.
REQUISITES: Prerequisite(s): Scholars Electives 1100F/G and permission of the Dean of the Faculty. Restricted to Scholar's Electives Students; normally taken in Year 2.

Courses.Name: SCHOLARS 3305E - SUPERVISED INDVL RESEARCH 2
Description: Under the mentorship of a faculty member, students will work on a research project, keep a complete record of the research, submit interim reports and, finally, a thesis, and present a seminar based on the research throughout the year.

Notes: RESTRICTED TO SCHOLAR'S ELECTIVES STUDENTS. PERMISSION REQUIRED FROM HOME FACULTY.

REQUISITES: Prerequisite(s): Scholars Electives 2200E or the former Scholars Electives 3303E and permission of the Dean of the Faculty. Restricted to students in the Scholar's Electives Program; normally taken in Year 3.

Courses.Name: SCHOLARS 4400Y - COMMUNITY ENGAGEMENT
Description: The purpose of this capstone course is to apply knowledge and skills learned in the Scholars Electives program to real-world problems. Students will complete a community-based project, attend workshops designed to increase their leadership skills and hone their presentation skills by delivering an accessible talk on their research.
Extra Information: Approximately 2 hours every second week.

Notes: RESTRICTED TO YR 4 SCHOLAR'S ELECTIVES STUDENTS. INFORMATION ABOUT THE DATES AND TOPICS OF SESSIONS WILL BE SENT TO STUDENTS BY EMAIL. PLEASE CONTACT REBECCA.SMITH@UWO.CA WITH QUESTIONS.
REQUISITES: Prerequisite(s): Enrollment in fourth year of the Scholars Electives module, registration in at least 5.0 other courses during the academic year.
